line.comment: * Wait for starting options to be answered.
* Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
* ZH 1.8 - Pacts expired all the time. I was unable to fix without adjusting this core Mayhem script.
* Zero Hour 1.8 - moved pact expiration here from ZH.Monitor
* Terracorp introduction message. * Zero Hour 2.0 - changed into general tutorial message
* Galaxy expansion none tutorial message, and black market message.
* Herobetty 5.1: Fixed message displayed after 24 hours instead of after 12 hours. This was a bug since base Mayhem 3.21b.
* Herobetty 5.1: Hive queens return to origin galaxies but only after 24 hours have passed.
* Herobetty 5.4: There is now a 4/3/2/1 +/- 0.5 hour timer on easy/normal/hard/insane difficulty for black market ships.
* do if get global variable: name='ZH_TerraformingProjects'
* disabled if player is currently using Xenon workforce for terraforming
* Zero Hour: disabled for a while after the Xenon Crisis
* Check previous invasion group's leaders to see if they are alive, and assess the number of groups against the t-file-set limit.
* ZH 2.0 - allows Xenon to exceed their vanilla fleet limit based on territory size
* Not very accurate because we only check the leader, but it's enough.
* Not very accurate because we only check the leader, but it's enough.
* Zero Hour 1.6: big invasion no longer guaranteed to spawn at a jump beacon
* ZH 2.0 - now we differentiate so that its not possible that too many small fleets prevent capships from spawning
* Safety: remove coalitions when needed. Even though coalitions are updated at each conquer, sometimes a coalition cannot be properly removed.
* Unlock, or lock the Teladi Stock exchange depending on player notoriety with them.
* To make the game more dynamic, we check if possible coalitions are possible every 12 hours.
* Every 20 minutes, there's a chance the A.I. races will remove your satellites.
* Chance improves with harder difficulty level. Enabled in 9973.
* Get array of all player satellites
* Notoriety level 6 (7 on insane) will allow your satellites to be untouched.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Reputation rank 7 is required on insane.
* negative notoriey adds 10% additional chance for your satellite to be taken down.
* Now remove any A.I. satellites from player space, assuming relations are not great. Fixed 35% chance per sector.
* Add-Ons 1.3: insane mode spawns smaller fleets (equivalent to normal difficulty) if sided with OCV, larger fleets if not sided with OCV.
* Add-Ons 1.2: J can spawn. (1.4.23: Fixed big invasions spawning fewer ships if player didn't join the OCV)
* the baseline is a 150 size galaxy
* on hard and insane difficulty the Xenon respawn timer also scales further down based on current Xenon territory size. Add-Ons 1.3: xenon cycle is reduced by 1/3 on insane.
* on easy or normal it only scales to the galaxy size
* this overdrive mode can only get triggered if at least 1 ingame day has already passed but the Xenons still own very few sectors, see ZH.Core

sval.val: The black market is now open!
Wait for starting options to be answered.
Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
ZH 1.8 - Pacts expired all the time. I was unable to fix without adjusting this core Mayhem script.
Sector alerts.
Claim expiration.
Truce expiration.
Zero Hour 1.8 - moved pact expiration here from ZH.Monitor
Terracorp introduction message. * Zero Hour 2.0 - changed into general tutorial message
Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial on insane.
Galaxy expansion none tutorial message, and black market message.
Herobetty 5.1: Fixed message displayed after 24 hours instead of after 12 hours. This was a bug since base Mayhem 3.21b.
Hive Queen.
Herobetty 5.1: Hive queens return to origin galaxies but only after 24 hours have passed.
Herobetty 5.4: There is now a 4/3/2/1 +/- 0.5 hour timer on easy/normal/hard/insane difficulty for black market ships.
Xenon invasions.
Add-Ons 1.1: removed Xenon dependency.
if $OCVplotstage == 'playerJoinedOCV'
$noXenonSpawns = null
do if get global variable: name='ZH_TerraformingProjects'
disabled if player is currently using Xenon workforce for terraforming
$noXenonSpawns = [TRUE]
if not $noXenonSpawns
Zero Hour: disabled for a while after the Xenon Crisis
$xenonCycleSmall = get global variable: name='mayhem_xenonCycleSmall'
$xenonCycleBig = get global variable: name='mayhem_xenonCycleBig'
ZH 2.0
Check previous invasion group's leaders to see if they are alive, and assess the number of groups against the t-file-set limit.
ZH 2.0 - allows Xenon to exceed their vanilla fleet limit based on territory size
Not very accurate because we only check the leader, but it's enough.
Not very accurate because we only check the leader, but it's enough.
Zero Hour 1.6: big invasion no longer guaranteed to spawn at a jump beacon
ZH 2.0 - now we differentiate so that its not possible that too many small fleets prevent capships from spawning
Favor timeouts.
Priority targets (diplomacy).
First check Total war setting.
Then permanent war.
Then hostile to player.
Then hostile to race1.
Then total random.
Safety: remove coalitions when needed. Even though coalitions are updated at each conquer, sometimes a coalition cannot be properly removed.
Unlock, or lock the Teladi Stock exchange depending on player notoriety with them.
3333 notoriety is reputation level 6.
To make the game more dynamic, we check if possible coalitions are possible every 12 hours.
Every 20 minutes, there's a chance the A.I. races will remove your satellites.
Chance improves with harder difficulty level. Enabled in 9973.
Add-Ons 1.3: Chance is 50% on insane.
Get array of all player satellites
Notoriety level 6 (7 on insane) will allow your satellites to be untouched.
Add-Ons 1.3: Reputation rank 7 is required on insane.
Player Infamy adds another 10%
negative notoriey adds 10% additional chance for your satellite to be taken down.
end while $satiterator
Now remove any A.I. satellites from player space, assuming relations are not great. Fixed 35% chance per sector.
end while $itty
Must not be Huge ships.
Add-Ons 1.3: insane mode spawns smaller fleets (equivalent to normal difficulty) if sided with OCV, larger fleets if not sided with OCV.
Add-Ons 1.2: J can spawn. (1.4.23: Fixed big invasions spawning fewer ships if player didn't join the OCV)
the baseline is a 150 size galaxy
on hard and insane difficulty the Xenon respawn timer also scales further down based on current Xenon territory size. Add-Ons 1.3: xenon cycle is reduced by 1/3 on insane.
on easy or normal it only scales to the galaxy size
this overdrive mode can only get triggered if at least 1 ingame day has already passed but the Xenons still own very few sectors, see ZH.Core
safety. Never go below 10 min
